SELECT PER.PER_ID AS PER_ID, PER.USERNAME AS USERNAME, PER.PER_NAME AS NAME, PAR.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, LJ.LJPYM AS LJPYM, LJ.LJQC AS LJQC, LJ.LJJC AS LJJC, DPT.DEP_NAME AS DEP_NAME,POST.ACC_ID POST_ID,POST.ACC_NAME POST_NAME FROM ORGA.PERSON PER INNER JOIN ORGA.PER_ACC_RELA PAR ON PER.PER_ID = PAR.PER_ID INNER JOIN ORGA.ACCOUNT POST ON POST.ACC_ID = PAR.ACC_ID INNER JOIN ORGA.DEPARTMENT DPT ON PER.DEP_ID = DPT.DEP_ID LEFT JOIN JHPT_JCSJ.LJZD LJ ON DPT.LJPYM = LJ.LJPYM WHERE PER.USERNAME = #{username} AND PAR.ACC_ID = #{accId}
and lj.ljjc = #{ljjc}

SELECT ACC.ACC_ID AS ACC_ID, ACC.ACC_NAME AS ACC_NAME FROM ORGA.PERSON PER INNER JOIN ORGA.PER_ACC_RELA PAR ON PER.PER_ID = PAR.PER_ID INNER JOIN ORGA.ACCOUNT ACC ON ACC.ACC_ID = PAR.ACC_ID WHERE PER.USERNAME = #{username}
